description: A CatalogGroup representing a collection of individual features from a Web FeatureService (WFS) server. By contrast to a WebFeatureServiceCatalogGroup, which creates oneWebFeatureServiceCatalogItem per feature *type* (eg, one item for rivers, one for lakes),this group creates one WebFeatureServiceCatalogItem per *feature* (eg, one item for eachindividual river).
title: Group of features in a Web Feature Service (WFS) Server
